title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Amazon reportedly in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI as circular deals stay popular
items.description: Amazon is in early discussions to invest as much as $10 billion in OpenAI in a deal that would see the AI lab using the e-commerce giant's AI chips.

items.title: Google deepens consumer credit push in India with UPI-linked card
items.description: Google has entered India's growing co-branded credit card market by partnering with Axis Bank.

items.title: Monzo board reportedly pushed out CEO Anil over IPO timing
items.description: A key issue, reportedly, was IPO timing.

items.title: Tesla engaged in deceptive marketing for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving, judge rules
items.description: The judge ruled Tesla should have to suspend manufacturing and sales in California for 30 days, but the DMV stayed those rulings for 90 days to allow ...

items.title: Weeks after raising $100M, investors pump another $180M into hot Indian startup MoEngage
items.description: The deal valued MoEngage at "well over" $900 million post-money.

items.title: X updates its terms, files countersuit to lay claim to the ‘Twitter’ trademark after newcomer’s challenge
items.description: X's new terms of service say that no one can use the Twitter name, trademarks, logos and more without written consent.

items.title: Study shows Instacart may be charging some shoppers 20% more for the same product
items.description: The delivery app has claimed that price testing is part of a longstanding practice in retail sales.

items.title: The Best Streaming Bundles and Streaming Deals of December 2025
items.description: The best streaming deals right now are ad-free. Maybe the best streaming deals are always ad-free.

items.title: Slate crosses 150,000 reservations despite waning EV truck enthusiasm
items.description: It took Slate Auto about seven months to grow its customer list by 50%, but new reservations appear to be outpacing any cancelations.

items.title: The 40 Best Shows on Apple TV, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
items.description: Down Cemetery Road, Pluribus, and The Morning Show are among the best shows on Apple TV this month.
